entry.title: Winklevoss Twins Donate $1 Million in Bitcoin to Unseat Elizabeth Warren
entry.summary: The crypto contribution to Republican challenger John Deaton follows a $2 million donation to Donald Trump from the pair.

entry.title: Stretchable, ‘Jelly’ Batteries Could Transform Wearables and Brain Implants
entry.summary: Researchers in China and the U.K. show off two approaches for flexible batteries that can provide power even when stretched.

entry.title: Erik Voorhees' Venice AI Now Offers Real-Time Search Results
entry.summary: Designed for privacy and uncensored results, the decentralized AI platform can provide—and cite—current information.

entry.title: Robinhood Can Get 'More Efficient' by Tokenizing Real-World Assets, Says Crypto Head
entry.summary: Both Robinhood’s CEO and top crypto exec hinted at a more expansive blockchain-backed future for the company this week.

entry.title: What Is Pixelverse? Telegram Game 'PixelTap,' the PIXFI Token, and Airdrop
entry.summary: UPDATED: The PIXFI token is now trading, and Pixelverse has revealed details around the PixelTap airdrop and TON layer-2 network launch.

entry.title: Biden's Election Prospects Crash on Crypto Markets After Report of Obama Concerns
entry.summary: Some 60% of bettors on predictions market Polymarket now think that VP Kamala Harris will become the Democratic presidential candidate.

entry.title: Here Are Today's ‘Hamster Kombat’ Daily Combo and Cipher Code
entry.summary: Looking for the daily combo and cipher code for Thursday, July 18? Here’s what you need to make bank in Telegram game Hamster Kombat.

entry.title: ‘Pixelverse’ Reveals Telegram Game Airdrop and TON L2 Plans as PIXFI Launches
entry.summary: PixelTap players will be able to claim an NFT, with some getting PIXFI tokens—plus a Pixelverse layer-2 network is coming to TON.

entry.title: GameStop Short Squeeze Predictions Fall Flat Without Roaring Kitty
entry.summary: It’s been over a month since meme influencer Keith Gill posted on Reddit. GameStop fans are still hungry for a historic short squeeze.

entry.title: How Crypto Could Help Telegram Become the West's First 'Everything App'
entry.summary: A core developer of TON, Telegram’s network of choice, says the app’s red-hot, crypto-backed mini apps are about to get a lot more intricate.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 161 - THE BIG WIF COMEBACK?
entry.summary: BTC ETF Inflows: +$53m. Crypto remains stable despite macro sell-off. ETH ETF providers undercut each other on fees. Grayscale keeps 2.5% high fee, launches mini-fund. Grayscale launches ‘Decentralised AI Fund’. Dimon may be ‘changing tune’ on Bitcoin. Many alts now bounced 50-90% from lows. Vote implies 55% of Mt. Gox depositors won’t sell. BlockFi to make creditor distributions this month. WazirX exchanges sees $230m suspected breach. Vitalik warns against voting ‘pro-crypto’. Vitalik & Autism Capital trade barbs. Bitcoin Magazine to hold pro-Trump fundraiser. State Street explore blockchain payments. UPbit sees 44% monthly drop in volume.

entry.title: Jack Dorsey's Block to Shutter Cash App in UK
entry.summary: Cash App won't be available in the UK from September 15, though the version available to British users didn't include Bitcoin buying functionality.

entry.title: DeFi Technologies Doubles Bitcoin Treasury Holdings and Adds Solana and Core
entry.summary: The company added Solana and Core to its balance sheet for the first time, calling them “complements” to Bitcoin.

entry.title: Trump Almost Banned Bitcoin in 2020—Until Steve Mnuchin Stopped Him, Says Block Exec
entry.summary: “Trump doesn’t believe in anything but himself,” Block Inc. exec Mike Brock said in a later message.

entry.title: Reddit Is Sunsetting Animated Collectible Expressions for Polygon NFTs
entry.summary: The expressions, which add animations to Reddit's Polygon-based Collectible Avatars NFTs, will be discontinued from August 2024.

entry.title: Polygon Will Migrate MATIC Tokens to POL During September Upgrade
entry.summary: There's no deadline for tokens that aren't automatically migrated, but “the community will have the power to establish a deadline in the future.”

entry.title: BlockFi Repayments to Its 100,000 Creditors Will Begin This Month
entry.summary: "Eligible clients will receive a notification to the BlockFi account email on file,” the company said in its announcement.

entry.title: Artist Brendan Murphy Launching Bitcoin 'Spacemen' via Ordinals
entry.summary: The "Frozen With Desire" Bitcoin Ordinals collection on Magic Eden includes access to a 3D recreation of the diamond-encrusted sculpture.

entry.title: Crypto Exchange WazirX Hit With ‘Security Breach,’ $235 Million Moved
entry.summary: Indian crypto exchange WazirX has paused rupee and crypto withdrawals after one of its multisig wallets was breached.

entry.title: Hong Kong Monetary Authority Proposes Rules for 'Fiat-Referenced' Stablecoins
entry.summary: The proposed rules would require a physical presence in Hong Kong, reserves to be kept at Hong Kong banks, and prohibit paying interest to holders.

entry.title: US Bitcoin ETFs Extend 9 Day Winning Streak Amid Surging Demand
entry.summary: Total daily net inflows from July 5 to July 17 amounted to roughly $1.97 billion marking the longest streak in a month.

entry.title: Robinhood Agrees to $9 Million Settlement Over Unsolicited Text Messages
entry.summary: The settlement resolves claims against Robinhood related to the referral program's text messages sent between August 2017 and February 2024.

entry.title: Viral Telegram Game ‘Hamster Kombat’ References Trump Assassination Attempt
entry.summary: Hamster Kombat’s new “Fight fight fight” card recreates Trump’s bloodied, fist-pumping moment—but with cartoon hamsters.

entry.title: People Prefer Being ‘Ruled’ By AI Over Humans: Study
entry.summary: Artificial intelligence was initially trusted more than human judgment, but human decisions were rated more favorably.

entry.title: Mena Suvari Nominated for Emmy for Gala Film Sci-Fi Series
entry.summary: Creator David Bianchi tells Decrypt the nomination is a first for a Web3 project, which included NFT tie-ins.

entry.title: Bitcoin Critic Senator Menendez to Quit Congress Following Corruption Conviction
entry.summary: Known for his staunch opposition to crypto and Bitcoin, Menendez had been an outspoken critic, advocating for stricter regulation.

entry.title: Biden Dropout Odds Spike to 66% on Polymarket After Covid Diagnosis
entry.summary: President Biden tested positive for Covid while traveling in Las Vegas soon after he said a “medical condition” could prompt him to withdraw.

entry.title: ‘Notcoin’ Players Get Exclusive Perks in Telegram Games ‘Pixelverse’ and ‘Musk Empire’
entry.summary: The original Telegram crypto game has linked up with Pixelverse and Musk Empire to give Notcoin players special benefits.

entry.title: Ethereum Creator Vitalik Buterin Rattles Industry After Warning of Pro-Crypto Candidates
entry.summary: Amid Trump’s increasing crypto embrace, Vitalik Buterin’s post drew a range of reactions—including one CEO calling him “politically naive.”

entry.title: Grayscale Ethereum Mini ETF Gets Green Light From the SEC
entry.summary: The smaller fund will likely start trading with the other Ethereum ETFs next week, one expert says.

entry.title: Ethereum Staking Near All-Time High as ETFs Loom and Rewards Rise
entry.summary: About 33.2 million Ethereum is being staked as the reward rate on the network reached 2.6%—with spot ETF trading right around the corner.

entry.title: Amazon’s AI-Powered App Builder Promises Tools Without a ‘Professional Developer’
entry.summary: One expert questions if businesses are ready to replace top-tech talent, however, when current AI trends target entry-level roles.

entry.title: Bitcoin Treasury Firm DeFi Technologies Rockets 25% After Major Q3 Profits
entry.summary: The company confirmed to Decrypt that it plans to add more BTC to its balance sheet following its June purchase.

entry.title: Nigerian Prison Doctor Faces Arrest In Detained Binance Exec Case
entry.summary: Detained Binance exec Tigran Gambaryan arrived in Abuja's court yesterday in a wheelchair, after complaining about suffering from back pain.

entry.title: Mark Cuban Says Bitcoin Is Driving Silicon Valley’s Love for Trump
entry.summary: Cuban, a fan of digital assets like Bitcoin and Dogecoin, predicted that the price of BTC will go "way higher."

entry.title: Bitcoin Gains Could Be Held Back by Stablecoin Liquidity, Says CryptoQuant
entry.summary: Bitcoin's price will only continue to surge if more liquidity enters the stablecoin market, according to analysis from CryptoQuant.

entry.title: Ethereum Will Hit $5,000 After ETFs Launch, Predicts Bitwise Exec
entry.summary: Ethereum's low inflation rate and substantial staked supply compare favorably to Bitcoin, writes Matt Hougan.

entry.title: Trump Floats Bitcoin Critic and JP Morgan CEO Jamie Dimon for Treasury Secretary
entry.summary: Prominent Bitcoin hater Jamie Dimon could be an ideal Treasury Secretary, according to Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump.

entry.title: Cats In, Dogs and Frogs Out: Meme Coin Meta May Be Shifting
entry.summary: Every dog has its day—but right now, cat-themed tokens are taking over the meme coin meta and outperforming more serious crypto categories.

Michael Dell calls Fink video ‘fascinating’. Fear & Greed index shifts to Greed. Tether mints $1bn USDT on Tron. Stripe expands crypto integration to the EU.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 158 - A WILD WEEKEND FOR BITCOIN
entry.summary: Trump response optimism takes BTC to $63K. Bitcoin whales accumulate most since April 2023. Trump still set to talk at Bitcoin Nashville. ETH ETF approval this week: Geraci. XRP vs SEC press conference rumoured on 18th. Crypto funds saw $1.44B inflows last week. Rumours China is to ‘unban BTC’ in Q4. S. Korea may delay crypto taxes until 2028. entry.title: Zoltan Istvan on AI and Human Immortality
entry.summary: Transhumanist Party founder Zoltan Istvan chats with Decrypt's Emerging Technology report Jason Nelson about his journey with transhumanism, running for office, and why he fears AI is outpacing life science and poses a threat to the quest for immortality.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 157 - ROLLBIT FRIDAY!
entry.summary: The German state sells $2bn+ BTC and has under $300m left. BTC ETF sees $800M of inflows, Mr 100 keeps buying. SOL ETF deadline set for 2025, election could be key. SOL stablecoin TVL soars on Tether & PYUSD growth. Firedancer sees the first accepted block on SOL testnet. ETH ETFs finally expected next week. Monthly active crypto addresses top 100m. Trump to speak at Bitcoin Nashville conference. Golman Sachs to launch 3 tokenization projects. Short squeeze in altcoins sees TIA rise 80% from lows. MOG leads top memes coins, BONK flips WIF. Farming interest shifts to Berachain & Monad.

entry.title: What's the Meta? Meet the Solana Dev Who Suffered Third Degree Burns to Pump a Token
entry.summary:
Meet Mikol: the Dare dev that doused himself in isopropyl alcohol and had fireworks shot at him. He instantly went up in flames and was rushed to hospital, where it became apparent he suffered third degree burns.
In this episode, Mikol reflects on the biggest night of his life, details his injuries, and the grueling recovery process he’s still in. Despite the traumatic incident, Mikol isn’t done with the project. Instead, he’s planning to build a decentralized app where community members can take on dares in exchange for DARE tokens.

Goldman Sachs to launch 3 tokenisation projects. Realised losses similar to COVID period. Staked ETH nears ATH. CEX stablecoin volume hits 7-month low. CFTC says 70-80% of crypto not securities. Base hardfork improves compression 20-30%. BitMEX pleads guilty to AML violation. APTOS & SEI see weak attendance at ETHcc event.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 155 - ETFs SAVE THE DAY

SOL Firedancer sees first accepted block on testnet. Tether mints another $250m USDT on SOL. Crypto monthly active addresses tops 100m. Biden crypto veto now expected to be upheld. Tech coalition urges Biden to back crypto. People face security threats at ETHCC. DBS sees 300% growth in crypto trading. PYUSD now 7th largest stable coin. China may have already sold BTC holdings. TIA rises 80% from lows on short squeeze. TON to release L2 based on Polygon’s tech stack.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 154 - THE CELEBS ARE BACK...

ETH ETFs set to launch next week. Election may affect SOL ETF decision March 2025. Raydium beats ETH for 24hr fees. BTC ‘power law’ points to 300% gain by 2025. BTC in 80 day post-halving re-accumulation phase. BlackRock treasury fund hits $500m. Republicans release pro-crypto policy. Senate urges blockchain tests for national security. Drop in BTC mining difficulty ‘comparable to FTX’. MetaMask introduces delegation toolkit. 25 major projects to launch tokens in H2 2025.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 153 - A WEAK WEEKEND

Crypto sentiment at lowest in over a year. ETH spot premium hits local highs. Japanese firm Metaplanet buys $2.5m BTC. Expect more miners merging: TeraWulf CEO. SOL Firedancer bug bounty goes live. GLM transfers $117m of ETH treasury to exchanges. 98% of coins have topped this cycle: Kang. ETH ETF should come in next 2 weeks: Geraci. Crypto progress disheartening: Copeland.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 152 - JOINED BY DEEZE!
entry.summary: BTC hits $54k, set for worst week in over year. Mt. Gox begins to move BTC & make distributions. German government continues to sell holdings. Worst day for BTC liquidations since FTX. Justin Sun says he is willing to buy German BTC. German MP calls on it to stop selling BTC. $52k super-trend support line eyed for BTC. Funding rates turn extremely negative across majors. Only 6 mining machines profitable below $56k. Coinbase spot buyers emerge to counter drop. Total3 hits RSI lows only hit 4 times in last 4 years. Fear & Greed index hits lowest since Jan 2023. Capo remains bullish. Real selling begins at $38k: Schiff. Coinbase continue to fight for Gensler’s emails. Circle mints $250m USDC on SOL. Symbiotic hits $1bn TVL. Taiwan Mobile may open crypto exchange. Unisat completes funding round with Binance.

ETH will outperform BTC after ETF launch: K33. ETH ETF may be delayed even further. BTC heading to $150k: Fundstrat. Chainlink & Fidelity partner for fund data on-chain. USDC protects the dollar: Circle ad. Robinhood considers crypto futures in US & EU. Another BTC miner looks to IPO in US. Vitalik bullish on prediction markets. Sellers starting to look exhausted: Crypto Quant. Silvergate sued by SEC, settles for $63m. Circle gets stablecoin license for USDC in EU. US DoJ ironically chooses Coinbase for custody. Bitcoin miner aims for $16bn IPO. Bitfarms increases BTC mining amid takeover attempt. DOT has 2 year runway amid large burn. DOT ecosystem builders turn against team. PENDLE TVL falls $3bn as restaking rewards end. PayPal stablecoin goes live on Jupiter. At least $600m altcoin unlocks this month.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 149 - LUCA NETZ LIVE!

German government sells $24m more more BTC. Mt Gox info probably ‘leaked to insiders’. Mr 100 buys dip for first time in 34 days. SOL leads Moonpay transactions for 5th week. Trump may speak at Bitcoin Nashville. Biden rehires crypto advisor. Crypto & AI complement each other: Balaji. Bitcoin will protect AI’s wealth: Pomp. Tether stops minting on Algorand & EOS. Jupiter launches v3 swaps. ETH Foundation mailing list gets leaked. Jump CEO resigns after CFTC investigation. 54% of Japanese institutional investors want BTC. Strike launches in UK. MiCA approved EUR stablecoins coming in 6 days.

entry.title: Transhumanism and the Quest for Immortality with SingularityNET CEO Dr. Ben Goertzel
entry.summary: Transhumanism is a philosophical and intellectual movement that advocates the enhancement of the human condition using technologies that can increase longevity, cognition, and well-being. In this interview, SingularityNET founder and CEO Dr. Ben Goertzel discusses his background in the transhumanist movement and how AI, and AGI will play a part.

entry.title: Vivendi Web3 Lead: 'There's No Ethical GenAI if You Don't Protect Content'
entry.summary: Fabien Aufrechter, VP of Web 3.0 at Vivendi, joined Rug Radio's Farokh aboard the Joker Odyssey at Cannes Lions to discuss the media group's plans for a global digital copyright, and how token-gated media will lead to the end of third-party cookies.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 148 - SOL ETF NARRATIVE DOMINATES
entry.summary: SOL leads majors as Van Eck files for ETF. Bitwise hints at SOL ETF filing. SOL will get ETF, ADA & XRP won’t: GSR. SOL price may rise 8.9x with ETF: GSR. Coinbase & Stripe team up for onboarding. BTC miner sell pressure weakens. BTC activity drops to lowest level in 10 years. Steve Cohen shuts down crypto arm of hedge fund. Crypto unmentioned in Presidential debate. Kraken co-founder donates $1m to Trump. Bolivia lifts BTC ban. MegaLabs raises $20m, aims for 100k TPS.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 147 - THE BLAST FALLOUT

Most ‘obvious & attractive’ buying opp possible. US man convicted of home invasions to steal BTC. Blast launches at $2.5bn FDV, disappoints many. ADA faces DDoS attacks with 200 transactions. Losses from deep fakes could hit $24bn in 2024. Miners face M&A boom on AI retrofitting. Marathon mines $16M KAS. Vitalik introduces ZK voting company Rarimo. Animoca Brands considers public listing.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 146 - IT'S BLAST DAY!
entry.summary: BTC ETFs reverse 7-day outflow. Geverman government to sell $35m more BTC. SOL Blinks allows transactions from any website. Jupiter allows you to swap tokens from X. Helius allows SOL staking from X. Drift allows you to leverage trade from X. ETH supply increases for 73 days straight. ETF review going smoothly: Gensler. Expect $15bn net inflows for ETH ETF: Bitwise. VanEck to waive ETH ETF fee until 2025. UAE new regulations could limit stablecoins. Court convicts two men for crypto ‘securities fraud’. BTC ETFs to be approved by Morgan Stanley. Vanguard CEO calls BTC ‘a stable asset like gold’. Blast launches today, 16.5% as community airdrop. $2.9bn FDV for Blast on Aevo, others predict higher. Top Blast holders to see vesting over 6 months. Nubank to integrate Bitcoin Lightning Network. FTX creditors to vote on cash or crypto repayment.
